Class Summary
Class
Description
ActionHandler
Class to handle more complex commands like use item with item or feed animal
Animal
Animals have all NonItems attributes and they can also be hungry and be fed to make them move away or killed to get meat
AnimalTest
Test class for class Animal
BeachActionsTest
Class to test beach-specific methods to enable ways or manipulate things in other ways
BrokerConnection
class to create and manage a client for the MQTT-connection
BrokerConnectionTest
class to test basic function of class BrokerConnection

Enemy

Test class for class Energy

Class to test the games and players energy processes and management

This class processes user input and controls the hole game
GameController

GameTest
 
GuiMainFrame
This class handles the main frame to attach UI to and allows adding new sub-windows.
GuiMainFrameTest
 
Helper
Helper Class for various additional methods
Inventory
The player can put things in his inventoryand remove or use them
InventoryTest
 
Item
Items are things that can be taken, dropped, added to inventory and used (except water, can only be drunk)
JungleActionsTest
 
MapPanel
This class creates the window with a picture of the map.
MapPanelTest
 
MockMessageDialog
Mock for JOptionPane, blocks showing up
MockOptionPaneNo
Mock for JOptionPane, ConfirmDialog returns no
MockOptionPaneYes
Mock for JOptionPane, ConfirmDialog returns yes
NonItem
NonItems are things that exist in rooms and the player can interact with them, but they can not be used like items (take etc.)
OptionPane
For message and option panes (necessary for mocks)
Player
This class contains all relevant data for the player
PlayerTest
 
Room
Rooms can be entered and left via ways and they can contain things and items
Splash
 
StatsPanel
JPanel containing the players stats
Thing
Abstract class for all occurring things in the game (ways, items, ...)
Trade
Data for single item trade
TradingHandler
Executes trading statements
TradingHandlerTest
Test Trading Feture
VillageActionsTest
 
Way
Ways connect rooms and can be blocked
Zork
Main class for the project, it parses, executes, saves and loads the game
ZorkTest
